subSubSection.paragraph:
Paratype
: 1 lot, 2 specimens —NUP 3844, 2, 41.8–44.0 mm SL: Brazil , Minas Gerais , Santa Fé , rio Bandeirante do Norte , tributary of Rio Pirapó , 23°00’26”S , 51°47’54”W , Nupélia staff,
